titles.title: A resolution expressing the appreciation of the House of Representatives for the heroism and civic achievements of Sergeant Alvin C. York and encouraging local communities and organizations throughout the United States to prepare ceremonies and activities to commemorate the one hundredth anniversary of his birth in 1987.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 1/7/1987--Introduced. Expresses appreciation for the heroism and civic achievements of Sergeant Alvin C. York. Encourages local communities and organizations to prepare ceremonies and activities to commemorate the 100th anniversary of his birth in 1987.
